name: Ext_R4_MedicationRequest_medication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicationRequest.medication[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.medication[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Identifies the medication being requested. This is a link to a resource that represents the medication which may be the details of the medication or simply an attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.medication[x]` maps to R5 `MedicationRequest.medication`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifies the medication being requested. This is a link to a resource that represents the medication which may be the details of the medication or simply an attribute carrying a code that identifies the medication from a known list of medications.

binding.description: A coded concept identifying substance or product that can be ordered.
